Congress.definition: a formal meeting of delegates 2 a
Congress.origin: [Latin congressus meeting, encounter, from congredi to approach, meet]

2 a.definition: the supreme legislative body of a nation and esp. a republic

sub_terms.b: the legislative branch of the United States governmentthe U.S. House of Representatives

sub_terms.a: the U.S. legislature as it is composed for an enumerated two-year period [the 101st]
sub_terms.b: a single session of the U.S. legislature see also,of thein the back matter
